Question: Soon, Columbia Records sent word that they "will spare nothing to bring this person back into the fold".
Hints: Though the extent of his injuries were never fully disclosed, this person said that he broke several vertebrae in his neck.
Asked if he played the cowboy, this person replied, "No, I play my mother.".
This person also toured with The Grateful Dead in 1987, resulting in a live album This person & The Dead.
